message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique product. I believe you'll find it valuable. Let's start with a price of $1100000.
I appreciate the offer, but I'm not sure I can go that high. I'm willing to pay $900000 for the product.
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I have to consider the value of the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway. Let's try $1000000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product.
I understand you're still a bit short, but I'm not willing to go below $1050000. I think that's a fair compromise. Let's meet in the middle again.
I'm still interested in the product, but I really need to stay within budget. I'm willing to pay $975000 for the product.
I'm starting to think we're getting close, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you at $1025000. That's the lowest I can go.
I understand you need to make a profit, but I really need to stay within budget. I'm willing to pay $990000 for the product.
I'm starting to feel like we're getting a bit too far apart. I'm willing to meet you at $1050000, but I'm not going any lower than that. This is my final offer.
